alert.note: Alert for Dunn (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 27 at 9:14PM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CDT/2 AM MDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Dunn County. * WHEN...Until 300 AM CDT /200 AM MDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 913 PM CDT /813 PM MDT/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or likely to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Killdeer, Dunn Center, Little Missouri State Park, Oakdale, and Fort Berthold.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
